animeTitle: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch Picture Drama - Hajimari no Zenya
animeDescription: A special included with the Blu-Ray release of the main series. Lelouch monologues on his dissatisfaction with Britannia's rule and the need to hide his and Nunnally's connection to the Britannian throne.(Source: Wikipedia)
animeRelated: ['Parent story: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch', 'Side story: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch Picture Drama']
